xwikidoc.title: ChangeRequestTranslations
xwikidoc.content: changerequest.docextra.title=変更のリクエスト ### Missing: changerequest.homepage.title=Change Requests changerequest.application.label=変更のリクエスト changerequest.picker.placeholder=変更リクエストの名称を入力してください changerequest.editor.button.save=変更リクエストとして保存 changerequest.createascr.button=作成リクエスト changerequest.savemodal.header.title=変更リクエストとして保存 ### Missing: changerequest.savemodal.header.hint=Provide some information to save your changes in a new or existing change request. changerequest.savemodal.create.heading=新しい変更リクエストを作成 changerequest.savemodal.create.input.title=変更リクエストのタイトル ### Missing: changerequest.savemodal.create.input.title.placeholder=a title representing the proposed changes changerequest.savemodal.create.input.description=変更リクエストの説明 changerequest.savemodal.create.input.draft=変更リクエストを下書きとする changerequest.savemodal.edit.heading=既存の変更リクエストに変更を追加 changerequest.savemodal.edit.input.selector=既存の変更リクエストを選択 changerequest.sheet.merge.button=マージ changerequest.sheet.merge.button.title=この変更リクエストをマージ changerequest.sheet.rebase.button=コンテンツを再読み込み changerequest.sheet.rebase.button.title=この変更リクエストの変更内容を、最新の公開済の内容で新たに読み込む（変更に関する全ての提案は保持されます）。 ### Missing: changerequest.sheet.rebase.confirm=This action will invalidate all reviews, are you happy to continue? changerequest.sheet.editapprovers.button=承認者を変更 changerequest.sheet.pagechanges=ページに関して要求されている変更： changerequest.sheet.alldifftitle=全ての変更 changerequest.sheet.difftitle={0}の変更 changerequest.sheet.difftitle.EDITION={0}の変更 changerequest.sheet.difftitle.DELETION={0}の削除 changerequest.sheet.difftitle.CREATION={0}の作成 ### Missing: changerequest.sheet.difftitle.NO_CHANGE=Edition of {0} without changes changerequest.sheet.markready.button=レビューの準備完了 changerequest.sheet.markready.button.title=この変更リクエストをレビュー待機中に設定 changerequest.sheet.markdraft.button=下書きに変換 changerequest.sheet.markdraft.button.title=この変更リクエストを作業中に設定 changerequest.edit.button.value=編集 changerequest.edit.button.title=変更リクエストで編集 changerequest.create.button.value=作成 changerequest.create.button.title=変更リクエストで作成 changerequest.delete.nested.message=入れ子式のページの削除は変更リクエストではサポートされていません。ボックスをチェックすると、削除のリクエストは無効となります。 changerequest.delete.button.disabled=入れ子式のページがあるページの削除をリクエストすることはできません。入れ子式のページのボックスのチェックを外して、ページの削除を個別にリクエストしてください。 changerequest.sheet.tab.description.title=説明 changerequest.sheet.tab.reviews.title=レビュー changerequest.sheet.tab.filechanges.title=ファイルの変更 changerequest.sheet.tab.checks.title=チェック changerequest.sheet.tab.checks.conflicts.noconflict.title=競合はありません changerequest.sheet.tab.checks.conflicts.title={0}個の競合があります changerequest.sheet.tab.checks.conflicts.noconflict.body=競合はありません。 changerequest.sheet.tab.checks.conflicts.body={0}個の競合がファイルの変更のうちにあります。{1}ファイルの変更のタブ{2}を確認して、競合を修正してください。 ### Missing: changerequest.sheet.tab.checks.conflicts.needsrefresh.title=An unresolved document conflict has been found. ### Missing: changerequest.sheet.tab.checks.conflicts.needsrefresh.body=An unresolved document conflict has been found. This is likely to be related to a deleted document or version, check the {0}Proposed Changes tab{1} and refresh the document content. changerequest.sheet.fixconflict.button=競合を修正 changerequest.sheet.tab.review.approvers.title=承認者 changerequest.sheet.tab.review.approvers.noapprover=この変更リクエストに関する承認者は規定されていません。承認者は承認権限にのみ基づきます。 changerequest.sheet.tab.review.approvers.approverslist=この変更リクエストの承認者： changerequest.sheet.tab.review.title.approved={0}により承認 ### Missing: changerequest.sheet.tab.review.title.notapproved=Change requested by {0} ### Missing: changerequest.sheet.tab.review.title.approved.onbehalf=Approved by {0} on behalf of {1} ### Missing: changerequest.sheet.tab.review.title.notapproved.onbehalf=Change requested by {0} on behalf of {1} changerequest.sheet.tab.review.title.outdated=期限切れ ### Missing: changerequest.sheet.tab.review.title.outdated.title=This review is not valid anymore and is not taken into account in approval strategies. changerequest.sheet.tab.review.button.markinvalid=無効にする changerequest.sheet.tab.review.button.markinvalid.title=このレビューを期限切れに設定 changerequest.sheet.tab.review.button.markvalid=復元 ### Missing: changerequest.sheet.tab.review.button.markvalid.title=Mark this review as valid again changerequest.sheet.tab.review.button.add=新しいレビュー changerequest.sheet.tab.checks.approvalStrategy.title=承認方針 changerequest.sheet.tab.checks.approvalStrategy.body.cannotBeLoaded=承認方針を読み込めません。 changerequest.sheet.checks.button=マージの準備ができていません changerequest.sheet.checks.button.title=いくつかの確認条件が満たされていません。クリックしてマージを行うために必要な修正を確認してください。 changerequest.sheet.checks.status.ready.explanation=この変更リクエストは既にレビューの準備完了に設定されてます。 changerequest.sheet.checks.status.draft.explanation=この変更リクエストは作業中です。作者が準備完了に設定した場合のみ、レビューとマージを行うことができます。 changerequest.sheet.checks.status.closed.explanation=この変更リクエストはキャンセルされました。再開されるまで変更できません。 changerequest.sheet.close.button=閉じる changerequest.sheet.close.button.title=変更リクエストを削除せず閉じる。 changerequest.sheet.open.button=開く changerequest.sheet.open.button.title=変更リクエストをレビューの準備完了として開く。 changerequest.sheet.open_draft.button=下書きとして開く changerequest.sheet.open_draft.button.title=変更リクエストを下書きとして開く。 changerequest.filechange.type.EDITION=編集 changerequest.filechange.type.DELETION=削除 changerequest.filechange.type.CREATION=作成 changerequest.filechange.type.NO_CHANGE=変更はありません changerequest.livetable.filechange.doc.location=保存場所 changerequest.livetable.filechange.doc.title=タイトル changerequest.livetable.filechange.filechange_type=変更の種類 changerequest.livetable.filechange.filechange_author=最新の変更の著者 changerequest.livetable.filechange.filechange_version=バージョン changerequest.livetable.filechange.filechange_documentVersion=公開済のドキュメントのバージョン changerequest.livetable.filechange._actions=アクション changerequest.sheet.tab.approvers.title=承認者 ### Missing: changerequest.sheet.hide=Hide ### Missing: changerequest.sheet.view=View ChangeRequest.Code.ConfigurationClass_approvalStrategy=マージの承認の方針 ChangeRequest.Code.ConfigurationClass_approvalStrategy.hint=変更リクエストのマージを許可する際に依拠する方針。 ChangeRequest.Code.ConfigurationClass_changeRequestLocation=変更リクエストの保存場所 ChangeRequest.Code.ConfigurationClass_changeRequestLocation.hint=変更リクエストのページを保存するスペース。 ### Missing: ChangeRequest.Code.ConfigurationClass_durationBeforeClosingStale=Duration to consider before closing stale change request ### Missing: ChangeRequest.Code.ConfigurationClass_durationBeforeClosingStale.hint=Duration expressed in days. Depending on the other options, this duration is considered since last activity of the change request, since it has been opened, or since it has been notified as stale. Setting this value to 0 will disable the feature. ### Missing: ChangeRequest.Code.ConfigurationClass_durationBeforeNotifyingStale=Duration to consider before notifying about stale change request ### Missing: ChangeRequest.Code.ConfigurationClass_durationBeforeNotifyingStale.hint=Duration expressed in days. This duration is considered since last activity of the change request, or since its creation depending on the other options. Setting this value to 0 will disable the feature. ### Missing: ChangeRequest.Code.ConfigurationClass_useCreationDateForStaleDurations=Use the creation date for stale change requests ### Missing: ChangeRequest.Code.ConfigurationClass_useCreationDateForStaleDurations.hint=Selecting Yes means that the creation date is only used to detect a stale change request. Selecting No means that the last activity of the change request will be used. ### Missing: ChangeRequest.Code.ConfigurationClass_schedulerContextUser=Scheduler user ### Missing: ChangeRequest.Code.ConfigurationClass_schedulerContextUser.hint=The user selected here will be the author of the notifications and updates when detecting a stale change request. This user should have appropriate rights for this. By default the author of the scheduler documents is used. ChangeRequest.Code.ConfigurationClass_mergeUser=ユーザーをマージ ### Missing: ChangeRequest.Code.ConfigurationClass_mergeUser.hint=If a user is specified here, this user will always be used when merging change requests to save the actual changes. So this user should have appropriate rights to do so. If nothing is specified here, then the user clicking on the merge button is used to save the changes. ### Missing: ChangeRequest.Code.ConfigurationClass_delegateEnabled=Enable delegate approvers ### Missing: ChangeRequest.Code.ConfigurationClass_delegateEnabled.hint=If enabled, allow to use delegate approval mechanism: the delegates are users allowed to perform reviews on behalf of the official explicit approvers of a page. ### Missing: ChangeRequest.Code.ConfigurationClass_delegateClassPropertyList=User properties to use for computing delegates ### Missing: ChangeRequest.Code.ConfigurationClass_delegateClassPropertyList.hint=This configuration specifies the list of XWikiUsers properties that should be used to automatically compute the delegate approvers. If the list is empty then the delegates should be set manually. ### Missing: ChangeRequest.Code.ConfigurationClass_preventAuthorsToReview=Prevent authors to review their own change requests ChangeRequest.Code.ConfigurationClass_preventAuthorsToReview.hint=チェックすると、作者は自分自身の変更リクエストをレビューできなくなります。 ### Missing: ChangeRequest.Code.ConfigurationClass_minimumApprovers=Minimum number of explicit approvers ### Missing: ChangeRequest.Code.ConfigurationClass_minimumApprovers.hint=Define a required minimum numbers of explicit users approvers when managing change request approvers. Note that 0 means no minimum. ChangeRequest.Code.ConfigurationClass_renderedDiffEnabled=レンダリングした差分表示を有効にする ChangeRequest.Code.ConfigurationClass_renderedDiffEnabled.hint=有効にすると、ページの変更の実際の表示で差分を確認できます。 ### Missing: ChangeRequest.Code.ConfigurationClass_renderedDiffComponent=Security policy to use for the rendered diff ### Missing: ChangeRequest.Code.ConfigurationClass_renderedDiffComponent.hint=The default policy is the safest but it prevents all scripts from being rendered, even if the scripts are part of the underlying document sheets. This posture can be relaxed by selecting one of the other approaches. ### Missing: ChangeRequest.Code.ConfigurationClass_acceptOnlyAllowedApprovers=Only accept approvers that have the approval right ### Missing: ChangeRequest.Code.ConfigurationClass_acceptOnlyAllowedApprovers.hint=When checked, users who are proposed as approvers are systematically validated to ensure they have approval right. ### Missing: changerequest.diffRender.name.default=Default policy ### Missing: changerequest.diffRender.description.default=Safest policy for the rendered diff: it prevents any script from being executed. ### Missing: changerequest.diffRender.name.guestright=Guest author rights policy ### Missing: changerequest.diffRender.description.guestright=This policy renders the page using the Guest user rights: the changes are rendered as if Guest was the author. ### Missing: changerequest.diffRender.name.authorright=Change author rights policy ### Missing: changerequest.diffRender.description.authorright=This policy renders the page using the rights of the user proposing the changes. Use with caution as this policy could allow unpublished scripts to be executed if the author has script rights. ### Missing: changerequest.diff.rendered.warningNotExact=This is an approximation of how the document will be rendered once published. For security reasons, rendering of rich content may be limited or unavailable. Rich content is often displayed in macros, so these elements of content will likely be blocked in this view. Macros that make use of JavaScript or access specific user information are particularly sensitive. changerequest.moreactions.manageapprovers=承認者を管理 changerequest.moreactions.deletionrequest=削除のリクエスト ### Missing: changerequest.moreactions.splitcr=Split this Change Request ### Missing: changerequest.moreactions.splitcr.confirm=Are you sure you want to split this Change Request? It will create new Change Requests for each modified document and will delete the current Change Request. This operation is irreversible and may break incoming links. ChangeRequest.Code.ApproversClass_usersApprovers=承認できるユーザー ChangeRequest.Code.ApproversClass_usersApprovers_hint=このドキュメントに関する変更リクエストを承認できるウィキのユーザー。 ChangeRequest.Code.ApproversClass_groupsApprovers=承認できるグループ ChangeRequest.Code.ApproversClass_groupsApprovers_hint=このドキュメントに関する変更リクエストを承認できるウィキのユーザーのグループ。 ChangeRequest.Code.ApproversClass_manualEdition=手動で変更済 ### Missing: ChangeRequest.Code.ApproversClass_manualEdition_hint=Check the box if you don't want the approvers to be automatically synchronized when new changes are published. changerequest.timeline.changerequest.create={0}が{2}に関する変更リクエストを作成しました ### Missing: changerequest.timeline.changerequest.create.fromSplit={0} created the change request by splitting an old change request with changes concerning {2} changerequest.timeline.changerequest.filechange.added={0}が{2}に関するファイルの新しい変更を追加しました ### Missing: changerequest.timeline.changerequest.status.modified={0} changed the status of the change request from {1} to {2} ### Missing: changerequest.timeline.changerequest.review.added.approval={0} added a new approval review changerequest.timeline.changerequest.review.added.requestchanges={0}が新しい変更リクエストのレビューを追加しました changerequest.timeline.changerequest.review.added.approval.delegate={0}が{1}に代わって新しい承認レビューを追加しました changerequest.timeline.changerequest.review.added.requestchanges.delegate={0}が{1}の代わりに変更を要求する新しいレビューを追加しました changerequest.timeline.changerequest.discussions.CHANGE_REQUEST_COMMENT={0}が{1}新しい全体コメント{2}を追加しました changerequest.timeline.changerequest.discussions.LINE_DIFF={0}が{1}新しい差分コメント{2}を追加しました changerequest.timeline.changerequest.discussions.REVIEW={0}が{1}新しいレビューコメント{2}を追加しました changerequest.timeline.changerequest.updated={0}が変更リクエストの説明あるいはタイトルを変更しました ### Missing: changerequest.timeline.changerequest.stale={0} marked the change request as stale ### Missing: changerequest.timeline.changerequest.rebased.all={0} refreshed the content of the whole change request ### Missing: changerequest.timeline.changerequest.rebased.filechange={0} refreshed the changes concerning {2} changerequest.timeline.changerequest.rebased.conflictFixing={0}が{2}の競合を修正しました changerequest.sheet.description.placeholder=右の編集リンクをクリックすると説明文を設定できます。 changerequest.sheet.existingChangeRequestSameChanges=ここで修正したページに関する他の変更リクエストが存在します： changerequest.sheet.checks.otherCR.title=同じドキュメントに関する既存の変更リクエスト changerequest.sheet.ready.button.title=この変更リクエストをレビューの準備完了に設定 changerequest.sheet.ready.button=レビューの準備完了 changerequest.sheet.draft.button.title=この変更リクエストを下書きに変換 changerequest.sheet.draft.button=下書きに変換 changerequest.sheet.review.button.title=現在の変更リクエストをレビュー ### Missing: changerequest.sheet.review.button.disabled.title=You are not allowed to review the current Change Request. changerequest.sheet.review.button=レビュー changerequest.sheet.diff.conflictLabel=競合 changerequest.sheet.diff.conflictLabel.title=これらの変更は新しく公開されたドキュメントのバージョンと競合しています。マージするには競合を修正する必要があります。 changerequest.sheet.message.outdated=期限切れ changerequest.sheet.message.outdated.title=このメッセージは有効ではありません。記載後に差分が変更されました。 changerequest.sheet.diff.outdated=期限切れ ### Missing: changerequest.sheet.diff.outdated.title=There was new changes in the published version of the document since this change request was edited. It is recommended to update the change request to see latest differences if possible. ### Missing: changerequest.sheet.diff.nochange=No change ### Missing: changerequest.sheet.diff.approverLabel=you are approver ### Missing: changerequest.sheet.diff.approverLabel.title=You are an explicit approver of this specific document. However, please be aware that approving or rejecting the changes will concern the entire change request. ### Missing: changerequest.sheet.diff.delegateApproverLabel=you are delegate approver ### Missing: changerequest.sheet.diff.delegateApproverLabel.title=You are a delegate approver of this specific document. However, please be aware that approving or rejecting the changes will concern the entire change request. ### Missing: changerequest.sheet.diff.detailsButton=View details ### Missing: changerequest.sheet.diff.details.location.metadata=Page property ### Missing: changerequest.sheet.diff.details.location.attachment=Property of attachment {0} ### Missing: changerequest.sheet.diff.details.location.xobject=Property of object {0} ### Missing: changerequest.sheet.diff.details.location.xclass=Property of class {0} ### Missing: changerequest.sheet.diff.details.propertyName=Property name: {0} changerequest.sheet.message.collapse.button.title=クリックするとメッセージを折りたたみます。 changerequest.sheet.message.expand.button.title=クリックするとメッセージを展開します。 changerequest.sheet.message.reply.button.title=このメッセージに返信 changerequest.sheet.message.reply.button=返信 ### Missing: changerequest.minimumApprovers.warning=The minimum number of explicit approvers is not met in this document. changerequest.conflict.modal.title=競合を修正 changerequest.conflict.modal.description=この画面から、この変更リクエストに関する競合の処理方法を選択できます。選択する前にバージョン間の変更を確認できます。 changerequest.conflict.modal.description.EDITION=この変更リクエストを行ってから、変更を提案した元のドキュメントが変更されたため、競合が発生しました。変更を維持するか、公開済のバージョンを維持するか、または、個別に競合の解決を試みることができます。 changerequest.conflict.modal.description.CREATION=この変更リクエストを行ってから、作成を提案したページが作成されたため、競合が発生しました。変更を維持するか、または公開済のバージョンを維持できます。 changerequest.conflict.modal.recommended=推奨 changerequest.conflict.modal.options.keepcr.title=変更リクエストを維持 changerequest.conflict.modal.options.keepcr.description=変更リクエストのバージョンを維持して競合を解決。 changerequest.conflict.modal.options.keeppublished.title=公開済のバージョンを維持 changerequest.conflict.modal.options.keeppublished.description=公開済のバージョンを維持して競合を解決。 changerequest.conflict.modal.custom.hint.disabled=このオプションは無効です。個別の解決では扱えないドキュメントの競合が生じました。 ### Missing: changerequest.conflict.modal.diffoption.previous=Original Document (Baseline) ### Missing: changerequest.conflict.modal.diffoption.next=Proposed Changes ### Missing: changerequest.conflict.modal.diffoption.current=Latest Publication ### Missing: changerequest.conflict.modal.diffoption.merged=Resolution: Priority to Latest Publication ### Missing: changerequest.conflict.modal.diffoption.merged_crfallback=Resolution: Priority to Proposal ### Missing: changerequest.conflict.modal.customchoices.current=published changes ### Missing: changerequest.conflict.modal.customchoices.next=current changes ### Missing: changerequest.conflict.modal.customchoices.previous=original changes ### Missing: changerequest.conflict.modal.customchoices.custom=custom changes ### Missing: changerequest.savemodal.approvers.edition.warning=Once a document has been published, any change to the list of approvers must be approved by the existing list of approvers before the changes impact any open review cycles. If you are looking to add or remove approvers for the changes proposed in this Change Request, please open a new Change Request with a new set of approvers. This Change Request will be automatically updated once the proposed change to the approvers has been accepted. changerequest.savemodal.approvers.header.title=承認者の管理 changerequest.savemodal.approvers.header.hint=ページに関する変更を承認できるユーザーとグループの一覧を設定できます。この一覧は新規または既存の変更リクエストで送信されます。 changerequest.savemodal.approvers.heading=承認者 changerequest.savemodal.approvers.users=承認できるユーザー changerequest.savemodal.approvers.groups=承認できるグループ ### Missing: changerequest.savemodal.approvers.minimumUsers.hint=Please note that you must select a minimum of {0} users approvers. ### Missing: changerequest.savemodal.error.missingChangerequest=Please type a new change request title, or select an existing change request. ### Missing: changerequest.savemodal.error.minimumApprovers=You must select a minimum of {0} approvers to save your changes. ### Missing: changerequest.savemodal.error.approversLackRight=Some or all of the selected approvers don't have view right to this page. ### Missing: changerequest.savemodal.error.otherError=The change request cannot be saved, maybe you can try creating a new change request or adding the changes to another existing change request. Here are the technical details about the encountered error: ### Missing: changerequest.sheet.message.reply.header=Reply to message from {0} sent {1}. ### Missing: changerequest.sheet.message.reply.link.title=Click to navigate to the previous message. ### Missing: changerequest.livetable.approvers.reviews.performed=review(s) performed ### Missing: changerequest.livetable.approvers.reviews.alreadyReviewed=already reviewed ### Missing: changerequest.review.modal.title=Review this change request ### Missing: changerequest.review.modal.selectApprover.title=On behalf of which user do you want to review? ### Missing: changerequest.review.modal.selectApprover.hint=Select the user for which you want to review: ### Missing: changerequest.review.modal.selectApprover.themselves=Review for yourself ### Missing: changerequest.review.modal.choice.approve=Approve change request ### Missing: changerequest.review.modal.choice.requestChanges=Request for changes ### Missing: changerequest.review.modal.comment.label=Provide a comment ### Missing: changerequest.review.modal.warningConflict=The change request you are about to review contains one or several conflict(s), be aware that any approval review will be invalidated when the change request will be modified to fix the conflict(s). ### Missing: changerequest.review.modal.warningReview=You already have a valid review concerning this change request, this new review will invalidate the previous one. ### Missing: changerequest.review.modal.warningReview.onBehalf=A valid review concerning this change request performed by or on behalf of {0} already exists, this new review will invalidate the previous one.
